articles.title: The Stanford women's golf team is taking over the Augusta National Women's Amateur - ESPN
articles.description: Getting into the field at the Augusta National Women's Amateur isn't easy. Yet, the Cardinal will make up 10 percent of the field at this year's event.
articles.content:
One of the most competitive rounds in women's golf might not take place at LPGA events.
